item.title: 美韩贸易谈判的议题是什么？
item.description: 韩国代表团将于周四在华盛顿与美国代表团举行贸易谈判，他们将面临一系列潜在的议程项目。【原文：When a South Korean delegation meets U.S. counterparts in Washington on Thursday for trade talks, they face a wide range of potential agenda items.】

item.title: 韩国将在首轮美国贸易谈判中降低关税作为目标
item.description: 韩国代表团将于周四与美国代表团举行首轮贸易谈判，预计造船业和能源方面的合作将被列入议程，而且由于首尔寻求降低关税，双方还可能分摊国防费用。【原文：A South Korean delegation will meet U.S. counterparts on Thursday for an opening round of trade talks, with cooperation on shipbuilding and energy expected to be on the agenda, and possibly shared defence costs, as Seoul seeks lower tariffs.】

item.title: 波音公司证实中国客户因关税问题拒绝购买新喷气机
item.description: 美国飞机制造商证实，由于关税原因，波音公司的中国客户正在拒绝交付为其制造的新飞机，第三架波音飞机已于周四开始返回美国。【原文：Boeing's Chinese customers are refusing delivery of new planes built for them due to tariffs, the U.S. planemaker has confirmed, as a third Boeing jet started returning to the U.S. on Thursday.】

item.title: 桥水三位联合首席信息官警告美国资产面临 "特殊风险
item.description: 桥水联合公司的三位联席首席投资官表示，在特朗普政府迅速转向 "美国优先 "的现代重商主义的情况下，他们认为美国资产面临 "特殊风险"。【原文：Bridgewater Associates' three Co-Chief Investment Officers said they see "exceptional risks" to U.S. assets under the Trump administration's rapid shift to modern mercantilism that puts "America First".】

item.title: 与总统共进晚餐特朗普备忘录硬币向顶级买家报价飙升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的纪念币周三飙升了 60% 以上，因为他发布了一个帖子，宣布 "世界上最独家的邀请"，承诺 $TRUMP 的前 220 位买家将在 5 月 22 日与总统共进私人晚宴。【原文：President Donald Trump's meme coin surged more than 60% on Wednesday after a post announcing "the most EXCLUSIVE INVITATION in the world" promised the top 220 buyers of $TRUMP a private gala dinner with the president on May 22.】

item.title: 市场评估特朗普的 "大转弯"，纾缓反弹受阻
item.description: 周四，投资者试图从特朗普政府及其对关税和美联储领导层的善变立场所带来的噪音中分辨出来，股市随波逐流，美元反弹也失去了牵引力。【原文：Stocks drifted on Thursday and a rebound in the dollar lost traction as investors tried to sift through the noise from the Trump administration and its fickle stance on tariffs and the Federal Reserve's leadership.】

item.title: 欧佩克+可能增产，石油下跌 2% 后保持稳定
item.description: 油价在上一交易日下跌近2%后，周四早盘有所回升，投资者正在权衡欧佩克+可能增产与白宫发出的关税信号以及正在进行的美国-伊朗核谈判之间的矛盾。【原文：Oil prices ticked up early on Thursday after falling nearly 2% in the previous session, with investors weighing a potential OPEC+ output increase against conflicting tariff signals from the White House and ongoing U.S.-Iran nuclear talks.】

item.title: 陷入关税大网：美国贸易战威胁中国鱼市
item.description: 在中国南方城市茂名，一座巨大的罗非鱼雕像在十字路口注视着来往的车辆，罗非鱼不仅是经济实惠的晚餐，还是成千上万人的职业、收入和生活方式。【原文：In Maoming, a southern Chinese city where a giant tilapia statue watches over traffic at an intersection, the fish isn't just a budget-friendly dinner, but a profession, income and way of life for thousands.】

item.title: 美国希望 "尽快 "与乌克兰签署经济伙伴关系协定
item.description: 美国财政部表示，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三会见了乌克兰总理丹尼斯-什米哈尔（Denys Shmyhal）和财政部长谢尔盖-马尔琴科（Sergii Marchenko），并强调了两国尽快签署经济合作伙伴关系的必要性。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent met Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal and Finance Minister Sergii Marchenko on Wednesday and stressed the need to sign an economic partnership between the two countries as soon as possible, the U.S. Treasury Department said.】

item.title: 贸易成为焦点，美元反弹势头减弱
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统放弃了解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的威胁，而且他的政府为在中国关税问题上采取更柔和的立场敞开了大门，美元继大幅反弹之后，周四稍作喘息。【原文：The dollar took a breather on Thursday, following a sharp bounce after President Donald Trump backed away from threats to fire Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell and his administration opened the door to a softer stance on China tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚阿尔巴内斯承诺建立关键矿产战略储备库
item.description: 澳大利亚执政党中左翼工党政府周四承诺，将初步投资12亿澳元（约合7.63亿美元）建立关键矿产战略储备，以寻求在中国主导的市场上建立独立的供应链。【原文：Australia's ruling centre-left Labor government on Thursday pledged an initial investment of A$1.2 billion ($763 million) to set up a strategic reserve of critical minerals as it looks to create a separate supply chain in a market dominated by China.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织预计日本央行将因关税不确定性而推迟进一步加息
item.description: 国际货币基金组织的一位高级官员周三表示，由于美国关税引发的不确定性加剧了经济增长和通货膨胀的下行风险，日本央行可能会推迟进一步加息的时间。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to push back the timing of further interest rate hikes as uncertainty triggered by U.S. tariffs has heightened downside risks to growth and inflation, a senior International Monetary Fund official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士第一季度利润大增，超出预期
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周四公布第一季度利润增长 158%，这主要得益于用于生成人工智能芯片组的先进芯片销售强劲，以及一些客户在美国可能征收关税前囤积半导体。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix on Thursday reported a 158% rise in first-quarter profit, thanks to strong sales of advanced chips used in generative artificial intelligence chipsets and as some customers stockpiled semiconductors ahead of potential U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克认为美联储削减资产负债表还有更长的路要走
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周三表示，目前的情况仍然支持继续缩减央行的资产负债表，并补充说她认为通过美联储的干预措施对市场流动性进行一些积极的管理是可以接受的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said on Wednesday conditions still support ongoing reductions in the central bank's balance sheet, adding she believes some active management of market liquidity via Fed interventions is acceptable to her.】

item.title: 泰勒科技因 IT 服务需求稳定而上调年度预期
item.description: 受 IT 服务需求强劲的推动，泰勒科技公司周三上调了全年业绩预期，第一季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Tyler Technologies raised its annual forecast and beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for its IT services.】

item.title: 美国议员因安全问题传讯中国电信巨头
item.description: 据路透社看到的信件称，美国国会一个委员会的领导人周三采取行动，迫使中国三大电信巨头配合对它们涉嫌支持中国军方和政府的调查。【原文：The leaders of a U.S. congressional committee on Wednesday moved to force China's three telecom giants to cooperate with an investigation into their alleged support for the Chinese military and government, according to letters seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普称对加拿大制造的汽车征收 25% 的关税可能会提高
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，对从加拿大进口到美国的汽车征收的25%的关税可能会提高。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday said a 25 percent tariff imposed on cars imported from Canada to the United States could go up.】

item.title: 美国称欧盟对苹果和 Meta 的罚款为 "经济勒索
item.description: 白宫周三表示，欧盟对苹果和 Meta Platforms 的罚款是一种 "新形式的经济勒索"，美国不会容忍。【原文：The White House said on Wednesday that fines on Apple and Meta Platforms by the European Union were a "novel form of economic extortion" that the United States will not tolerate.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司下调 2025 年业绩展望，预计第二季度利润下滑
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）周三撤回了全年财务预测，理由是当前宏观经济的不确定性。【原文：Alaska Air Group on Wednesday withdrew its full-year financial forecast, citing the prevailing macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司因言论自由问题起诉阻止明尼苏达州 "深度伪造 "法
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 周三起诉了明尼苏达州，理由是该州法律禁止人们使用人工智能生成的 "深度伪造 "来影响选举，该公司称这违反了对言论自由的保护。【原文：Elon Musk's social media platform X sued Minnesota on Wednesday over a state law that bans people from using AI-generated "deepfakes" to influence an election, which the company said violated protections of free speech.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片需求激增，Lam Research 季度收入超预期
item.description: 受先进人工智能芯片需求强劲的推动，芯片制造设备供应商Lam Research周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，公司股价在盘后交易中上涨4.5%。【原文：Chip-making equipment supplier Lam Research beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, fueled by robust demand for advanced AI chips, sending the company's shares up 4.5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 损失准备金减少，利息收入增加，Discover Financial 利润大增
item.description: 美国信用卡发行商发现金融公司（Discover Financial）周三报告称，受信贷损失准备金下降和利息收入增加的影响，该公司第一季度利润增长了 30%。【原文：U.S. credit card issuer Discover Financial reported a 30% rise in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by a drop in the company's provision for credit losses and higher interest income.】

item.title: 交易日 贸易战担忧减弱，华尔街延续反弹势头
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 新加坡业务强劲，拉斯维加斯金沙季度利润超出预期
item.description: 由于新加坡业务的强劲需求抵消了澳门市场增长的停滞，赌场运营商拉斯维加斯金沙周三公布的第一季度利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Casino operator Las Vegas Sands surpassed analysts' expectations for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, as strong demand from its Singapore business offsets stalling market growth in Macao.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：特朗普将豁免汽车制造商部分美国关税
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引几位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，在汽车行业高管最近几周的大力游说下，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正计划免除汽车制造商的部分关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is planning to spare carmakers from some tariffs following intense lobbying by industry executives over recent weeks, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing a couple of people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普政府对进口商用卡车展开国家安全调查
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，正在对进口到美国的中型和重型卡车及相关零部件对国家安全的影响展开调查。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Wednesday it is opening a probe into national security impacts of imports of medium-duty and heavy-duty trucks and related parts into the United States.】

item.title: 西南航空公司下调 2025 年和 2026 年利润展望
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周三以当前宏观经济的不确定性为由，下调了 2025 年和 2026 年的利润预期。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Wednesday pulled its profit outlook for 2025 and 2026, citing the current macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 消息人士称，狮门股东批准分拆制片厂和 Starz 业务
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的人士周三告诉路透社，《约翰-威克》系列电影的幕后工作室狮门娱乐公司（Lions Gate Entertainment）的股东已经批准了一项将其电影和电视工作室从 Starz 业务中分离出来的计划。【原文：Shareholders of Lions Gate Entertainment , the studio behind the "John Wick" movie franchise, have approved a plan to split its film and TV studio from the Starz business, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩表示，美元配置正从超重转向更自然的权重
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）周三表示，最近资产组合配置从美元向外转移，可能代表着从超配美元资产转向更自然地在美元和包括欧元在内的其他货币之间加权。【原文：The recent shifts in asset portfolio allocations away from the dollar may represent a move from overweighting dollar assets to a more natural weighting between dollars and other currencies, including the euro, European Central Bank executive board member Philip Lane said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道通用汽车将增加俄亥俄州变速器工厂的产量
item.description: 通用汽车公司周三证实，该公司将增加俄亥俄州托莱多工厂的变速器产量，从电动汽车驱动装置生产转向汽油车零部件生产。【原文：General Motors is increasing production of transmissions at its Toledo, Ohio facility, shifting away from EV drive unit manufacturing toward parts for gasoline vehicles, the company confirmed Wednesday.】
